metadata.title: CVE-2024-28054 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Amavis before 2.12.3 and 2.13.x before 2.13.1, in part because of its useof MIME-tools, has an Interpretation Conflict (relative to some mail useragents) when there are multiple boundary parameters in a MIME emailmessage. Consequently, there can be an incorrect check for banned files ormalware.

criterions.comment: amavisd-new package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
